explains: adj. 无可挑剔的；无瑕疵的；纯洁的

sentences.cn: 她把家里收拾得一尘不染。

sentences.en: Do not expect that debate to be as placid as the spotless sun.
sentences.cn: 不要指望那个辩论像一尘不染的太阳那么宁静。

sentences.en: Regardless of how filthy your past has been, your future is still spotless.
sentences.cn: 即使你的过去是一团乱麻，你的未来也是一尘不染的。
